name: framer-db
// targets: to see all targets run: nx show project framer-db --web

prisma:deploy._comment: Deploy the prisma schema to the database. Used in production environments.

prisma:create-migration._comment: Create a migration based on updated schema values.

prisma:generate._comment: Generates the prisma client based on the schema.

prisma:reset--dev-only._comment: WARNING: Should only be used in development. Clear all data from the database, then will apply all migrations, and finally run all seed scripts.

supabase:reset--dev-only._comment: Completely reset the local supabase server. Useful if you need to start from scratch to reset Auth, DB, and Storage. WARNING: This will delete all data in the database.

options.command: npx supabase db reset && nx run framer-db:prisma:reset--dev-only --force
